home.description: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection

about.title: Cloud Town Exquisite Craft
about.subTitle: CTEC
features: One of the top Technical Minecraft Communities in Asia
Active in Minecraft's vanilla environment for technical research
Optimized survival, redstone technologies and aesthetic builds
State-of-the-art server equipment that fosters creativity
Collaborative research in friendly forums with outstanding players from various countries
The farm holds the world record for being ranked sixth globally and first in Asia.

card.title: Top-tier Architectural Team
card.paragraph: We strive to blend Redstone and architecture, showcasing unique creations in survival mode. Our architects hail from diverse fields, each a master of at least one style. We believe that only by standing on the shoulders of giants can we broaden our horizons. In learning from the masters, we also frequently engage with teams and servers deeply rooted in the architectural community, including the Ghost Whale server, Arthas Industries, and the LIF Frame Wood Production Group. CTEC also provides a comprehensive set of plugins and a creative environment for architects to showcase their talents.

card.title: Advanced Redstone Technology
card.paragraph: Our community boasts strong technical capabilities, with numerous Redstone technology developers proficient in various tech tree research, maintaining friendly relations with multiple international Technical Minecraft Communities. Our team is dedicated to research and innovation, continuously rolling out various novel farms or components, providing more fun for community members. We have set up dedicated labs, including two creative servers and two mirror servers, allowing players who do not wish to play survival to join in the fun. Our farms hold the world record for being ranked sixth globally and first in Asia.

card.title: Stable and Reliable Server Equipment
card.paragraph: We possess excellent server equipment, capable of supporting a large number of players online simultaneously for development and play. We have low-latency connection proxy servers in various countries, providing an excellent gaming experience for players from different regions. Our equipment features an i9-13900K, 128G RAM, 6TB Gen 4 SSD, and a UPS uninterrupted power supply system. We also have amateur engineers maintaining the servers, ensuring their stable operation.

redstone.title: Redstone Team
features: Submit your redstone creations to the submission channel or directly message a reviewer to apply for review.
We will invite authors of outstanding works to join.
Reviewer Discord:

build.title: Building Team
build.subTitle: The review will be based on the following criteria:
features: Structural Rationality: Defies Newtonian physics (exceptions for magic/fantasy themes, but exaggeration must be reasonably grounded), the work should display rational building structures and accurately replicate stylistic details and structure, not just surface appearance.
Color Application: The work employs stunning visual effects through the application of color concepts and coloring skills.

Creativity: Plagiarism, poor secondary creation, and exploiting review loopholes are strictly prohibited in the Cloud Town building department. Please respect each original work. Authors with rich creativity can reflect a strong personal style and unique innovative ability in their work.

logistics.title: Logistics Team
features: We hope to recruit Minecraft players who have basic redstone knowledge and are enthusiastic about the game. If you are dedicated, have a bit of redstone knowledge, and are full of passion for the game, please fill out the Cloud Town Craft Logistics Team form. If your score meets the standard, there will be a second review based on activity.

Low-latency proxy servers distributed globally for optimal gaming experience
